The propped open door in front of Hellpeon exploded exposing what appeared
to be a cargo hold. indside previously full crates were torn apart and
scattered from being emptied. the other two beams shot through the base, one
deflecting off an armored wall and the other striking one of the bases
Gattling defenses.

Behind him another of the ships defenses activated, a harpoon launcher fired
a spiked harpoon towards the attacking bot. It wasn't much of a weapon, it
was an act of desperation on the bases part to halt any further advancement.
